text: 34:14 Ua Me Ini 21:2; Godɨn Araziba 15:12‘Ia zurara azenir namba 7ɨn vaghavagh, uan ingangarir gumazamizir kɨnibar amutɨ me fɨrighɨregham. Ian namakaba me ian uari amangɨtɨ, ia me inightɨ me ian ingangarir gumazamizir kɨnibar otivigh, ian ingangaribar amuam. Egh me ingar mangɨvɨra ikɨ 6plan azeniba gɨvagham. Eghtɨ azenir an gɨrara irimra, ia me ateghtɨ me pura mangɨ.’ Ian ovaviba akar kam gɨfo, egha me nan akam barazir puvatɨgha, an gɨn zuir puvatɨ.
